definitions.body: city in SW. Judah Jos 15:10, 1Sa 6:9, 1Sa 6:12, 1Sa 6:12, 1Sa 6:13, 1Sa 6:15, 1Sa 6:19, 1Sa 6:20, 1Ki 4:9, 2Ki 14:13 = 2Ch 25:23, 2Ch 28:18; distinguished from other places of same name as [[אֲשֶׁר לִיהוּדָה]] ´[[שׁ]] ´[[בּ]] 2Ki 14:11 = 2Ch 25:21; assigned to Levites Jos 21:16 = 1Ch 6:44;—ruin at mod. ‘Ain Shems Rob:BR ii. 223 f. Bd:Pal 163 Survey:iii. 35, 60.
city in Naphtali Jos 19:38, Ju Jdg 1:33, Jdg 1:33
city in Issachar Jos 19:22; possibly ‘Ain esh-Shemsîyeh, Jordan valley, S. of Beisân (Beth Shean) Survey:ii. 231.
= On-Heliopolis, in Egypt Je 43:13 Rob:BR i. 25 Eb:GS 505 f. Dl:Pa 318 f.
